content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this apartment is negotiable, but I would like to maximize my gains. I suggest that we start at 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I will take 750 Euros per month.

I'm willing to pay 750 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. Thank you for your offer, Juan.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I need to ask you a few more questions before we finalize the rental agreement.

That's a great rental price, Juan. But I need to ask you a few more questions before we finalize the rental agreement.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, feel free to ask any questions you may have.
name: Heinrich Heine
